title: mahmud-visuals
overview: Mahmud is an incredible graphic designer, and I was honored to build his online portfolio website.  Using HTML and CSS, I focused on creating a clean and visually striking platform to showcase his work.  The goal was to let Mahmud's designs shine, with a website that complements his style and makes a lasting impression.
content: Working with Mahmud was fantastic. His keen eye for design made it easy to translate his vision into a website that's both beautiful and functional.  Clean lines and thoughtful use of space allow visitors to fully appreciate his portfolio pieces. This project was a great reminder of how web development can enhance the work of talented artists and designers!
